classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, E, F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). NO CRP FOR D5. Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP), and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). Quarterly advisor meetings are required prior to registration.
